title: What information does a naturopath look for during the first consultation?
description: Answer (1 of 3): What information does a naturopath look for during the first consultation? You will receive information about clinic policies and procedures which you may be asked to formally acknowledge. You will be asked to sign a consent for assessment and treatment.
